meanings.sent1: Don't be a meathead and forget your keys at home.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the meathead for not paying attention in class.
meanings.sent3: The meathead tried to fit a square peg into a round hole.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a meathead when it came to trying new things.
meanings.sent5: Being a meathead in this situation will only lead to trouble.

meanings.definition: A person who is muscular but lacks intelligence.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler was known as the meathead of the team.
meanings.sent2: Despite his muscles, he was often teased for being a meathead.
meanings.sent3: The meathead struggled to solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His meathead appearance masked his lack of critical thinking skills.
meanings.sent5: The meathead's brawn overshadowed his brain.

meanings.definition: A person who is stubborn or inflexible in their thinking.
meanings.sent1: The meathead refused to consider any other options.
meanings.sent2: Being a meathead about it won't help solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was wrong, the meathead wouldn't admit it.
meanings.sent4: His meathead attitude prevented him from seeing the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: The meathead's stubbornness was his downfall.
